description:
This is a step-by-step course that teaches you how to plan, implement, and optimize a sales funnel for your small business.

You will learn about:

  • Planning your sales funnel
    • How to convert visitors into customers
    • How to maximize your customers' lifetime value
  • Email Marketing
    • How to create lists
    • How to segment your lists
    • How to setup automation
  • Opt-in Forms
    • How to actually setup an opt-in form - with, or without a website
    • How to optimize your forms
  • Driving Traffic
    • Through paid advertising like Facebook and Adwords Express
    • Inbound Marketing

I leave nothing out - step-by-step, and if you have a question - I'm here for you!
title: How To Build A Sales Funnel For Your Small Business
